column5: Hello there!  Anyone could PM me a [better than average] spot for perch in the Barrie-Innisfil (Simcoe) area? I will be fishing from shore. I heard that people go and fish in the Barrie Marina, but I'm not sure if that's the spot or rather just convenience.  Many thanks!  Danubian

Well in Barrie, it's about both, fish the marina because it's convenient and there are keeper perch and the odd pike now and then.  Go down the street to the Tiffin launch, last couple of years, there were quite a number of folks catching some good size perch from the shore.
that spot is non stop action in spring.
